name: sylan9ss
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: syl2an(w0, w1, wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2), wss(c2, c1))
stmt.pretty: syl2an(w0, w1, c0 ⊆ c1, c0 ⊆ c2, c2 ⊆ c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))
-| wi(w1, wss(c2, c1))
-| wi(wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c2, c1)), wss(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))
-| wi(w1, wss(c2, c1))
-| wi(wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c2, c1)), wss(c0, c1))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c2, c1)), wss(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))
-| wi(w1, wss(c2, c1))

comment: A subclass transitivity deduction. (Contributed by NM, 27-Sep-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 14-Jun-2011.)
